message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I think would be a great fit for you. I'm asking for $140 for it. Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I can only pay up to $120 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your interest! I'm willing to come down a bit. How about $130? That gives us both a good deal.
Thanks for adjusting, Alice. I'll take it at $125 if that works for you.
